text: This was the first edition of the tournament. Pedro Sousa won the title after defeating Alessandro Giannessi 6–3, 7–6(7–3) in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Internazionali di Tennis d'Abruzzo - Singles
title: 2017 Internazionali di Tennis d'Abruzzo – Singles
